summary: Comprehensive testing of i18n (internationalization) feature for CRM Pro. All tests passed. Language toggle switches between English and Indonesian correctly. Sidebar menu labels, dashboard content, stat cards, and login page elements all translate correctly. Language preference persists in localStorage across page refreshes. Both desktop and mobile language toggles work correctly.
passed_tests: Language toggle button (data-testid='language-toggle') switches between EN and ID
Language toggle shows current language indicator (EN/ID)
Admin Dashboard: Sidebar menu items translate correctly (Overview→Ringkasan, Leaderboard→Papan Peringkat, Daily Summary→Ringkasan Harian, etc.)
Admin Dashboard: Title translates (Dashboard Overview→Ringkasan Dasbor)
Admin Dashboard: Stat cards translate (Pending DB Requests→Permintaan DB Tertunda, Pending Reservations→Reservasi Tertunda, Monthly ATH→ATH Bulanan)
Admin Dashboard: Database overview section translates (Refresh→Segarkan, All Products→Semua Produk, Total Records→Total Data, Available→Tersedia, Requested→Diminta, Assigned→Ditugaskan)
Staff Dashboard: Sidebar menu items translate correctly (Browse Databases→Telusuri Database, My Requests→Permintaan Saya, My Assigned Customers→Pelanggan Saya, etc.)
Staff Dashboard: Stat cards translate (Available Databases→Database Tersedia, My Requests→Permintaan Saya, My Downloads→Unduhan Saya)
Login Page: Subtitle translates (CRM Management System→Sistem Manajemen CRM)
Login Page: Password label translates (Password→Kata Sandi)
Login Page: Submit button translates (Sign In→Masuk)
Login Page: Right side text translates (Sign in to your account→Masuk ke akun Anda)
Language preference saved to localStorage under key 'language'
Language preference persists after page refresh
Mobile sidebar menu items translate correctly when language is changed
critical_code_review_comments: LanguageContext properly implements toggle and switch functions
Translation files (en.js, id.js) are comprehensive with 400+ translation keys each
Translation function handles nested paths (e.g., 'nav.dashboard') correctly
Fallback to English implemented when translation key not found in Indonesian
localStorage persistence implemented correctly with 'language' key
HTML lang attribute updated when language changes (document.documentElement.lang)
Both desktop and mobile language toggles use the same toggleLanguage function from context
Menu items use useMemo with language dependency to re-render when language changes
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing test accounts
context_for_next_testing_agent: i18n feature fully tested and working. Language toggle button has data-testid='language-toggle' (desktop) and data-testid='language-toggle-mobile' (mobile). Language preference stored in localStorage under 'language' key. Translations cover: nav menu items, dashboard titles, stat cards, form labels, buttons, and various UI elements. Translation files located at /app/frontend/src/translations/en.js and /app/frontend/src/translations/id.js. LanguageContext provides t() function for translations and toggleLanguage() for switching.
